attacks.name: Synthesis
attacks.effect: Take 2 Grass Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Critical Bloom
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned and Asleep.

abilities.name: Trap Territory
abilities.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 more.

attacks.name: Quick-Grow Beam
attacks.effect: If Quick-Grow Extract is in your discard pile, this attack does 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Ignition
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may take a Fire Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to your Active Fire Pokémon.

attacks.name: Inferno Onrush
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Crimson Dive
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.effect: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Shell Shield
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

attacks.name: Double Splash
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Water Energy attached, this attack also does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Triple Bombardment
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Water Energy attached, this attack also does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Surprise Strike
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon moved from your Bench to the Active Spot this turn, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Aqua Shower
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mirror Shot
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lead
attacks.effect: Put a random Supporter card from your deck into your hand.

attacks.name: Stored Power
attacks.effect: Move all Psychic Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Infinite Increase
abilities.effect: This Pokémon gets +30 HP for each Psychic Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Sweet Scent
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Perfume Blast
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon cost 1 Colorless more.

attacks.name: Geoburst
attacks.effect: This attack's damage is reduced by the amount of damage this Pokémon has on it.

attacks.name: Dig
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Rapid Smashers
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 90 damage for each heads. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Gunk Shot
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Snatch and Flee
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck. Shuffle this Pokémon into your deck.

attacks.name: Acid Spray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metal Defender
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Adamantine Rolling
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes  damage from attacks and has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 Metal Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metal Blast
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Copy a Friend
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your Benched Pokémon's attacks, except any Pokémon ex, and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn't have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Cyberjack
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Trainer card in your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Starly from your deck onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Hurricane Wing
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Revenge
attacks.effect: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

abilities.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 more.

attacks.name: Guard Press

attacks.name: Quick Blow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Big Beat
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Big Beat.

abilities.name: Psychic Connect
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may move all Psychic Energy from 1 of your Benched Psychic Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grindcore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sol Breaker
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Rising Road
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cursed Metal
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your Psychic Pokémon and Metal Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
